Phanuel Egejuru bụ onye odee na onye ọkammụta Naijiria, onye ebe akụkụ ya lekwasịrị anya bụ nhazi nchịkọta, mkpirisi akụkọ ifo, akwụkwọ ojii na ihe ịchọ mma, akụkọ ifo ndị Britain narị afọ nke centuri iri na itoolu na Victorian England
A maara ya nke ọma maka The Seed Yams Have been Eaten
Egejuru gụrụ akwụkwọ na Nigeria, Senegal, Ivory Coast na France
Ọ gara mahadum nke Minnesota, ma gụsịa akwụkwọ magna cum laude na French
Mgbe ọ kwagara na Mahadum California, Los Angeles (UCLA), ọ nwetara MA, MPH na PhD na akwụkwọ ntulekorita
Ọ kuziri na UCLA na Tanzania, New York, Nigeria
na Rhode Island, tupu   ọ kwaga Mahadum Loyola Marymount
